properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 2:44PM AKST until January 18 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills will
cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
Expect wind chills to 40 below zero.

* WHERE...Central Interior over Minto Flats and the Elliott
Highway between Livengood and Minto.

* WHEN...6 AM Thursday to 3 PM Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast winds 15 to 20 mph will develop
Thursday over the Elliot Highway Between Livengood and the Minto
Road, and over Minto Flats. This will cause very cold wind
chills that will persist into Saturday. Travelers should be
prepared for drifting snow and very cold wind chills.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 3 PM AKST SATURDAY
